SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Delivery Group Summary Fields

The Order Delivery Group Summary object defines a group of order product summaries belonging to one order summary to be fulfilled using the same delivery method and delivered to the same recipient. An order delivery group summary is used to create one or more fulfillment orders.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Delivery Group Summary object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Adjustments	

The total of the price adjustments, not including tax, applied to delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.

This amount includes only order item summaries of type code Charge.


Adjustments Tax	The tax on the total of the price adjustments applied to delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.
Adjustments with Tax	

The total of the price adjustments, including tax, applied to the delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.

Adjustment with Tax = Adjustments + Adjustments Tax


Delivery Instructions	Special instructions for the delivery.
Description	The description of the order delivery group summary.
Desired Delivery Date	The desired date for the delivery.
Email Address	The email address of the recipient.
Gift Message	The gift message to include with the delivery.
Is Gift	Indicates whether the order delivery group summary represents a gift.
Name	The name of the recipient.
Order Delivery Method	The order delivery method specified for the order delivery group summary.
Order Summary	The order summary associated with the order delivery group summary.
Original Order Delivery Group	The original order delivery group associated with the order delivery group summary.
Phone Number	The phone number of the recipient.
Pretax Total	The total, including adjustments but not tax, of the delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.
Promised Delivery Date	The promised date for delivery.
Shipping Address	The address of the recipient.
Subtotal	The amount, not including adjustments or tax, of the delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.
Subtotal Tax	The tax on the subtotal.
Subtotal with Tax	

The amount, including tax, of the delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.

Subtotal with Tax = Subtotal + Subtotal Tax


Tax	The tax on the total amount.
Total with Tax	

The total, including adjustments and tax, of the delivery charges associated with the order delivery group summary.

Total with Tax = Pretax Total + Tax

This amount includes only order item summaries of type code Charge.

title: Understanding Order Delivery Group Summary
